sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import {faTimesCircle,faTrash } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' const iconClose = const iconTrash = const Done = ()=>{ const [done, setDone] = React.useState([]); const [edit, setEdit] = React.useState(false); const TokenLocal = localStorage.getItem("token") React.useEffect(()=>{ fetchDoneTask(); }, []); function fetchDoneTask(){ axios .get(`http://localhost:1000/api/task?token=${TokenLocal}&isFinished=true`) .then((res)=>{ setDone(res.data) }); } function onUpdate(id,isFinished){ axios.put(`http://localhost:1000/api/task?token=${TokenLocal}&id=${id}`,{ isFinished : isFinished, }).then(()=>{ fetchDoneTask(); }) } function onDelete(id){ axios.delete(`http://localhost:1000/api/task?token=${TokenLocal}&id=${id}`) .then(()=>{ fetchDoneTask(); }); } return
    { edit ? (
    Name
    Time
    {iconClose}
    setEdit(false)}>{iconTrash}
    ) : (

    Done

    {done.map((task) => (
    {task.taskName}
    {task.time}
    onUpdate(task._id, false)}> {iconClose}
    setEdit(true)}> {iconClose}
    onDelete(task._id)}>{iconTrash}
    ))}
    ) }
; } export default Done;
